content: I want to thank the few people in my life who listen without judging, speak without prejudices, help without unnecessary words, understand without complaining, and love me unconditionally.
translations: ita:Voglio ringraziare le rare persone della mia vita che ascoltano senza giudicare, parlano senza pregiudizi, aiutano senza
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by Miktsoanit (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
